original_title: 人妻秘書、汗と接吻に満ちた社長室中出し性交 業界屈指の美熟女Madonna専属秘書に就任！！ 白石茉莉奈
overview: Marina is the wife of an accountant guy who was working for a small company, however, such a company is performing poorly and it ends up acquired by another bigger company. The CEO of such a big company, Ozawa, hires both the husband and Marina to work as accountants, but he decides to also acquire Marina, and he changes her work position to “personal secretary”, raising her salary above the husband’s, and making her work inside his office…
title: Married Woman Secretary, Creampie Fuck in the Manager’s Office Full of Sweat and Kissing - Marina Shiraishi
